ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED( CMPL123_WF_Action__c ) && CMPL123_WF_Action__c =="Verify Effectiveness - CAPA Action Plan" && ISPICKVAL( Effectiveness_Check_Required__c,"No")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot perform Verify Effectiveness - CAPA Action Plan action while Effectiveness Check Required? field is set to No. Please change it to Yes and perform action again.
